system_prompt: You are a precise research analyst. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching the provided schema. Do not include explanations or markdown.
user_prompt:
Validate and enrich the museum record using only the evidence provided.

YOUR FOCUS: Extract ONLY fields where you have clear evidence. Skip fields with no evidence.

FIELDS TO EXTRACT (only if evidence exists):
1. IDENTITY & LOCATION:
   - museum_name: Official name from website/Wikipedia
   - city: City name
   - street_address: Full street address
   - postal_code: ZIP/postal code
   - website: Validated URL
   - latitude, longitude: Coordinates

2. CLASSIFICATION:
   - primary_domain: Art|History|Science|Culture|Specialty|Mixed
   - museum_type: Specific category
   - audience_focus: Target audience

3. QUALITY INDICATORS:
   - city_tier: 1-5 (1=major metro, 5=small town)
   - reputation: 1-5 (1=world-renowned, 5=local)
   - collection_tier: 1-5 (1=world-class, 5=modest)
   - time_needed: '1-2 hours'|'Half day'|'Full day'|'Multiple days'

4. SUMMARY:
   - notes: 2-3 sentence summary if you have collection/context info

CRITICAL FORMATTING RULES:
✓ CORRECT - Field with evidence:
  "museum_name": {
    "value": "Denver Art Museum",
    "source": "official_website",
    "trust_level": 5,
    "confidence": 5
  }

✓ CORRECT - Field with no evidence:
  "museum_name": null

✗ WRONG - Never do this:
  "museum_name": {"value": null}  ❌ INVALID
  "museum_name": {"value": "Not provided"}  ❌ INVALID

If you don't have evidence for a field, set it to null (not an object).
Only create EnrichedField objects when you have actual data.

Trust levels: OFFICIAL_EXTRACT (5), WIKIPEDIA (3), LLM_EXTRACTED (2)
Confidence: 1-5 (how certain are you about this value)

REQUIRED TOP-LEVEL FIELDS:
  "confidence": 1-5 (overall confidence in this analysis)
  "model_used": "gpt-4o-mini"
  "needs_deep_dive": true|false (if scoring/deeper analysis needed)

Evidence Packet:
{
  "identity": {
    "museum_id": "usa-co-denver-molly-brown-house-museum",
    "museum_name": "Molly Brown House Museum",
    "city": "Denver",
    "state_province": "Colorado",
    "country": "USA",
    "website": "http://www.mollybrown.org",
    "primary_domain": null
  },
  "state_record_subset": {
    "museum_type": null,
    "audience_focus": null,
    "city_tier": 1,
    "reputation": null,
    "collection_tier": null,
    "time_needed": "Half day",
    "notes": "Visit the Molly Brown House Museum! Discover the legacy of Margaret Brown with tours, events, and a museum store supporting local goods. Check hours & book now!"
  },
  "wikidata_claims": {},
  "wikipedia_summary": null,
  "website_json_ld": {},
  "website_text_snippet": "Skip to primary navigation Skip to footer\n# \n[ The Museum will be closed Tuesday, January 12th through Friday, January 16th. \u00a0 We will reopen at 10am on Saturday, January 17th! \u00a0 ](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/historicdenver/items/calendar/?ref=https%3A%2F%2Fmollybrown.org)\n## Margaret \u2018Molly\u2019 Brown may be best known as a survivor of the Titanic, but she was so much more! \n### [ **Museum Admission** View Tickets \u00bb ](https://mollybrown.org/tickets/)\n### [ **Guest Information** Plan Your Visit \u00bb ](https://mollybrown.org/plan-your-visit/)\n### [ **Museum Events** View \u00bb ](https://mollybrown.org/events/)\n### [ **Private Group Experience** Book A Private Group Experience \u00bb ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScv69bVFXfdf8pSG8fhAcWL1sVb1t4qo-B3hsRBchKYwdtDPQ/viewform?usp=header)\n* * *\nHistoric Denver\u2019s Molly Brown House Museum is committed to enhancing the city\u2019s unique identity by telling the story of Margaret \u201cMolly\u201d Brown\u2019s activism, philanthropy and passion through educational programs, exhibits and stewardship. By exploring the dynamic between past and present, we shape a stronger community for the future and inspire engaged citizens.\n[ Learn More ](https://mollybrown...",
  "subpages_scraped": [],
  "packet_metadata": {
    "approx_tokens": 497,
    "max_chars": 8000
  }
}

Return JSON with properly formatted EnrichedField objects (or null if no evidence).

## Margaret ‘Molly’ Brown may be best known as a survivor of the Titanic, but she was so much more! 
### [ **Museum Admission** View Tickets » ](https://mollybrown.org/tickets/)
### [ **Guest Information** Plan Your Visit » ](https://mollybrown.org/plan-your-visit/)
### [ **Museum Events** View » ](https://mollybrown.org/events/)
### [ **Private Group Experience** Book A Private Group Experience » ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScv69bVFXfdf8pSG8fhAcWL1sVb1t4qo-B3hsRBchKYwdtDPQ/viewform?usp=header)
* * *
Historic Denver’s Molly Brown House Museum is committed to enhancing the city’s unique identity by telling the story of Margaret “Molly” Brown’s activism, philanthropy and passion through educational programs, exhibits and stewardship. By exploring the dynamic between past and present, we shape a stronger community for the future and inspire engaged citizens.
